title: The vision and discourse of Henry the seuenth Concerning the vnitie of Great Brittaine. Diuided into foure chapters. 1. Containing an introduction. 2. Inducements to vnitie. 3. The policy, deceit, and mischieuous spite of the vnderminers hereof. 4. The danger of diuision. Related by T.G.
author: Gainsford, Thomas, d. 1624?
publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Henry Fetherstone, and are to be sold at the signe of the Rose in Paules Church-yard,
